introduction.description: I’m a Junior Full Stack Developer based in Italy. I am passionate about technology and always looking for new challenges.

pittari.title: Pittari Website
pittari.description: My project combines a passion for languages with web development. Pittari (ピッタリ in Japanese) is a portal that offers various useful features for learning Japanese. From kanji search to articles and forums, Pittari provides comprehensive resources for Japanese language learners.
